729088f-a.title: Richmond: Lincoln Avenue - Mason Avenue
729088f-a.text:
Lincoln Ave., at Mason Ave. (Midland Beach). fhe view is north
eastward across Lincoln Ave. from the S.W. corner.
July 12, 1929.
P. L. Sperr.
NO REPRODUCTIONS.
729088f-a.folder: Lincoln Avenue & Mason Avenue, Staten Island, NY

729131f-a.title: Richmond: Mason Street - Lincoln Avenue
729131f-a.text:
Mason Ave. (10th Street), at the S.W. corner of Lincoln Ave.
P. L. Sperr states that it is the old John Vanderbilt House which
later passed to Barnes and then to James Graham. Still later it
became the John F. Riordan home.
July 12, 1929.
P. L. Sperr.
NO REPRODUCTIONS.
729131f-a.folder: Mason Street & Lincoln Avenue, Staten Island, NY
